p: In all three assays, the positive controls—acarbose for α-glucosidase (Fig. 6) and α-amylase (Fig. 7), and orlistat for lipase (Fig. 8)—caused a significant reduction in enzyme activity when compared with the uninhibited control. This is as expected and provided validation of the assay methods and confirmed the suitability of the assays for their intended purpose [ 102].
